title: authme登录插件的问题！
author: BazcVone
txt_content:
如何调整同一个IP的注册数量！我想让每个IP可以注册3个号
但是现在只能一个IP只能注册一个帐号   老是提示说 ：你不能再注册小号了

replies.author: 鸭蛋只吃黄
replies.txt_content:
在配置文件的这一行
    maxRegPerIp: 1
改成3就行

replies.author: BazcVone
replies.txt_content:
settings:
  restrictions:
    enablePasswordVerifier: true
    ProtectInventoryBeforeLogIn: true
    allowCommands: []
    displayOtherAccounts: true
  security:
    passwordMaxLength: 20
  messagesLanguage: en
BackupSystem:
  ActivateBackup: false
  OnServerStart: false
  OnServeStop: false
  MysqlWindowsPath: C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 5.1\
Security:
  SQLProblem:
    stopServer: true
  ReloadCommand:
    useReloadCommandSupport: true
  console:
    noConsoleSpam: false
    removePassword: true
Passpartu:
  enablePasspartu: false
Converter:
  Rakamak:
    fileName: users.rak
    useIp: false
    ipFileName: UsersIp.rak
    newPasswordHash: SHA256
DataSource:
  mySQLColumnEmail: email
  mySQLColumnId: id
Email:
  RecoveryPasswordLength: 8
  mailPort: 465
  mailSMTP: smtp.gmail.com
  mailAccount: ''
  mailPassword: ''
  mailSenderName: ''
ExternalBoardOptions:
  mySQLOtherUsernameColumns: []
Xenoforo:
  predefinedSalt: ''
我的config是这样的

replies.author: BazcVone
replies.txt_content:
凋灵兔子 发表于 2015-12-13 12:18
在配置文件的这一行
    maxRegPerIp: 1
改成3就行
